channel.title: Random on 2D Steve
channel.description: Recent content in Random on 2D Steve

item.title: Dialects
item.description: I’m a big fan of dialects. I love the way people sound and how they sound different.

item.title: Friday, Friday, Gonna Get Down on Friday
item.description: Someone kill me for getting that song stuck in my head.

item.title: My Desktop
item.description: I just thought everybody should see this wallpaper and desktop setup because I’m very proud!

item.title: Themes!
item.description: I couldn’t take it anymore! I finally updated the theme to my blog.

item.title: Fiddling
item.description: So I just spent the last hour and a half trying to find a new theme to spruce up my blog and ended up realizing that the one I have is just fine.
